{{location infobox | name=Dark Door | image=Artem Demura - Dead Men of Dunharrow.jpg | caption="Dead Men of Dunharrow" by [[:Category:Images by Artem Demura|Artem Demura]] | pronun= | othernames=Gate of the Dead Men
Gate of the Dead
Forbidden Door | location=Beginning of the [[Paths of the Dead]], end of the [[Dimholt]], foot of [[Dwimorberg]]; beyond [[Dwimorberg glen]] | type=Door | description=Hollow opening, carved into the cliff, with a standing stone in the centre | regions= | towns= | inhabitants= | created= | destroyed= | events=Passage of [[Baldor]] and [[Aragorn|Aragorn II]] }} {{quote|...And so they came at last deep into the glen; and there stood a sheer wall of rock, and in the wall the Dark Door gaped before them like the mouth of night. Signs and figures were carved above its wide arch too dim to read, and fear flowed from it like a grey vapour [...] 'This is an evil door,' said [[Halbarad]], 'and my death lies beyond it [...]' It seemed to [Gimli] that he dragged his feet like lead over the threshold; and at once a blindness came upon him...|''[[The Return of the King]]'', "[[The Passing of the Grey Company]]"}} The '''Dark Door''', also called the '''Gate of the Dead Men'''{{NM|P3xxii}}, entry on "Morthond" and the '''Gate of the Dead''',{{VT|42a}}, p. 22 was the entrance to the [[Paths of the Dead]] beneath the [[White Mountains]]. Through this entrance in {{TA|2570}} [[Baldor]] son of [[Brego]] passed never to return.{{App|TA}} On [[8 March]] {{TA|3019|n}} through the door [[Aragorn]] and his companions passed during the [[War of the Ring]] to stir the [[Oathbreakers|Dead Men of Dunharrow]].{{App|Great}} ==Portrayal in adaptations== ===The Dark Door in adaptations=== File:The Lord of the Rings - The Return of the King - Dark Door.png|The Dark Door - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' File:The Lord of the Rings Online - Dark Door.jpg|The Dark Door - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'' '''2013: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':''' :The Dark Door is accessed by player shortly after the passing of the [[Grey Company]], leading them from [[Rohan]] into [[Gondor]]. Approaching the Door gives the player a large amount of dread. {{References}} [[Category:Doors and gates]] [[Category:Rohan]] [[de:Dunkles Tor]] [[fi:Pime√§ Portti]] [[fi:Vainaiden Ovi]] [[fr:encyclo:geographie:villes tours et forteresses:rohan:porte des morts]]
